Title: Sanzoku Diary
Description: ['Bundled with the limited edition sixth volume of the manga. It will be between 10 to 15 minutes long and will adapt the events of the first volume.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: MAL News)', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' The hero and author of ', Sanzoku Diary, ' is Okamoto Kentarou. When he was young, he lived out in the country, and he knew an old man who was a hunter. In 2009, Kentarou was inspired to leave Tokyo and return to Okayama Prefecture to become a hunter himself. Using an air rifle and traps, Kentarou hunts, prepares, and eats various animals. The manga covers all his hunting-related activities in close detail. ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: MangaHelpers)']
